strapiPost.title: Find The Perfect Mother's Day Gift At Peel Museum Store
strapiPost.content:
Peel Museum & Botanical Garden has a thoughtfully curated assortment of locally-made goods in the Peel Museum Store â€“ a perfect place to find a gift in time for Mother's Day.

  • Inside and out: Find handcrafted items ranging from jewelry, greeting cards, candles, teas, and pasta to garden decorations like stained glass bird baths, wind chimes, and yard thermostats, and shop their Hanging Basket Sale from May 11-13.
  • Only here: The Peel Museum Store merchandise is only available in-store, so swing by anytime Tuesday through Saturday, 10a-3p at 400 S Walton Blvd. Shop Arkansas-made gifts, and take a free tour of Peel Museum & Botanical Garden while you're there!

Tomorrow is the last day to pre-purchase a Hanging Basket. Reserve yours online HERE, or shop in person during pick-up times May 11-13.
